alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Orange; Washington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 12:12PM EDT until July 07 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Orange County in central Vermont... Southwestern Caledonia County in northeastern Vermont... Northeastern Washington County in central Vermont... * Until 115 PM EDT. * At 1211 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Putnamville, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Barre, Montpelier, Calais, Plainfield, Orange, Websterville, East Montpelier, Marshfield Village, Groton, Middlesex, Marshfield, Cabot Village, Barre Town, Washington, Cabot, Barre City, Ricker State Park, E F Knapp State Airport, Walden, and Peacham. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
